oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Captain Archibald D. Norris, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA to his father
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Captain A.D. Norris, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA to his father dated November 5, 1861. Written from Martin Bottom, Pocahontas County, Virginia. Author writes of soldiers receiving packages from home and writes; fondly of the clothing his family sent to him. He goes on to write of receiving payment for two months of service recently and of a politician related to "the great John Bell" who came to speak to the troops.
